alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:05AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, south central Craven, eastern Onslow and west central Carteret Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 105 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Piney Green, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Morehead City, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Cape Carteret, Maysville, Silverdale, Kellum, Midway Park, Belgrade, Broad Creek, Kuhns, Peletier, Bogue, Hammocks Beach and Deppe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
